Set the Translation Vector to: * X: 0.0 * Y: 0.5504 * Z: 0.0 Sketch Now create the 2D sketch. Face 1 Create a new face for the sketch. Loop 1 1. Create line 1 from: * Start Point: (0.0, 0.5896) * End Point: (0.7028, 0.0) 2. Create line 2 from: * Start Point: (0.7028, 0.0) * End Point: (0.75, 0.0562) 3. Create a circle with: * Center: (0.037, 0.6061) * Radius: 0.0061 Loop 3 1. Create a circle with: * Center: (0.2579, 0.4212) * Radius: 0.0076 Extrusion Now we are ready to create the 3D model by extruding the 2D sketch. 1. Set the extrude depth towards the normal to: 0.5504 2. Set the extrude depth opposite the normal to: 0.0 3. Set the sketch scale constant: 0.75 4. The extrusion will create a new solid body since its operation is set as 'NewBodyFeatureOperation'. Description Here are the dimensions and properties of the part: 1. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch using the following euler angles and translation vector: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.6891] Extrude the 2D sketch by 0.0609 towards its normal to generate the 3D model. **Intermediate CAD Part 2: A Cylindrical Object with a Slightly Tapered Top and Bottom** Begin by creating a new coordinate system for part 2: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 180.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0609, 0.1335, 0.6891] Create the first face of the sketch: - Draw a circle: * Center: [0.0433, 0.0433] * Radius: 0.0433 Close the loop at the start point of the circle, and scale the sketch using a scaling parameter of 0.0866. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch using the following euler angles and translation vector: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 180.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0609, 0.1335, 0.6891] Extrude the 2D sketch by 0.6891 towards its normal to generate the 3D model, joining it with the previous part. The resulting CAD model consists of the above two parts. Part 1 has dimensions of approximately 0.21 x 0.21 x 0.06 units, and part 2 has dimensions of approximately 0.09 x 0.09 x 0.7 units. The final CAD assembly has a cylindrical shape with a hexagonal head and a straight shaft.</description>
